info.name: FitFive Public API
info.description: Public endpoints for FitFive e-commerce platform. These endpoints do not require authentication and can be used to fetch publicly available data like products and categories.

request.description: Fetch all available inventory items that are active and in stock. Returns detailed product information including item details, pricing, and stock levels.
